question: Who will win Islanders v. Lightning: Semifinals Game 2?
description: This is a market on who will win the NHL Stanley Cup Semifinals Game 2 between the New York Islanders and Tampa Bay Lightning, scheduled to take place on June 15, 2021, at 8 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Islanders” if the New York Islanders win, or “Lightning” if Tampa Bay Lightning wins. If the match is postponed to a date on or before 8:00 PM ET, June 22, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after 8:00 PM ET, June 22, 2021 or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: Who will win Islanders v. Lightning: Semifinals Game 2?
events.description: This is a market on who will win the NHL Stanley Cup Semifinals Game 2 between the New York Islanders and Tampa Bay Lightning, scheduled to take place on June 15, 2021, at 8 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Islanders” if the New York Islanders win, or “Lightning” if Tampa Bay Lightning wins. If the match is postponed to a date on or before 8:00 PM ET, June 22, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after 8:00 PM ET, June 22, 2021 or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Trump mention "Russia/Putin" 5 or more times during his CNN town hall?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump mentions Russia/Putin 5 or more times during his CNN town hall scheduled for 9 PM ET on May 10, 2023. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

“Russia”
“Russian”
"Russia's"
“Putin”
"Putins"
"Putin's"

Pluralization/possessive of the words above will count toward the resolution of this market - mere references will not count.

The resolution source is live video of the CNN town hall. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

If this event is cancelled or delayed beyond May 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

events.title: Trump CNN Town Hall: Will he mention...?
events.description: This is a market group over which specific terms Donald J. Trump will mention in his CNN town hall scheduled for 9 PM ET, May 10.

question: Will Trump mention "Ron DeSantis" 5 or more times during his CNN town hall?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump mentions "Ron DeSantis" 5 or more times during his CNN town hall scheduled for 9 PM ET on May 10, 2023. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

Only the following phrasings will count as mentions of DeSantis:
"Ron"
"DeSantis"
"Ron DeSantis"
"Ron DeSanctimonious"
"Ron DeSanctus"

Note that if e.g. he says "Ron DeSantis", it only counts as one mention. References to the above names will not count. Pluralization/possessive of the above names will count toward the resolution of this market. If Trump says e.g. "meatball Ron" it will count.

The resolution source is live video of the CNN town hall. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

If this event is cancelled or delayed beyond May 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will Trump mention "Joe/Joseph Biden" 5 or more times during his CNN town hall?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump mentions "Joe Biden" 5 or more times during his CNN town hall scheduled for 9 PM ET on May 10, 2023. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

Only the following phrasings will count as mentions of Biden:
"Joe"
"Joseph"
"Biden" (however phrases that don't reference Joe Biden such as Jill Biden or Hunter Biden will NOT count)
“Joe Biden"
"Joseph Biden"

Note that if e.g. he says "Joe Biden's", it only counts as one mention. References to the above names will not count. Pluralization/possessive of the above names will count toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source is live video of the CNN town hall. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

If this event is cancelled or delayed beyond May 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

"GPT-5"
"LLM"
"Large Language Model"

The resolution source is live video of the CNN town hall. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

Pluralization/possessive/different tenses of the phrases will count toward the resolution of this market.

If this event is cancelled or delayed beyond May 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

question: IPL: Mumbai Indians vs. Bangalore Royal Challengers 2023-05-09
description:
In the upcoming IPL game, scheduled for May 9 at 10:00 AM ET:

If the Mumbai Indians win, the market will resolve to “Mumbai”.

If the Bangalore Royal Challengers win, the market will resolve to “Bangalore”.

 If the game is not completed by May 16, 2023 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will 'Fast X' gross more than $65 million domestically on its opening weekend?
description:
'Fast X' (2023) is an upcoming American action adventure film distributed by Universal Pictures. It is the tenth main installment in the Fast and Furious movie series. It is scheduled for theatrical release in the USA on May 19, 2023.

This is a market on how much ‘Fast X' will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt5433140/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (May 19 - 21) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if ‘Fast X’ grosses more than $65,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Opening weekend is defined as the first Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the film's release. Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo number under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend, regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by May 29, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

events.title: 'Fast X' opening weekend
events.description:
This is a market group over domestic box office domestic opening figures for "Fast X" (2023)
.

question: ARB or SUI higher on May 19?
description:
This market will resolve to "ARB" if the Binance 1 minute candle for ARB/USDT titled 2023/05/19 12:00 in the ET timezone (referring to noon ET) has a final “Close” price higher than the "Close" price for the candle of the same title for SUI/USDT.

This market will resolve to "SUI" if the Binance 1 minute candle for SUI/USDT titled 2023/05/19 12:00 in the ET timezone has a final “Close” price higher than the "Close" price for the candle of the same title for ARB/USDT.

This market will resolve to 50-50 if the Binance 1 minute candles for ARB/USDT and SUI/USDT titled 2023/05/19 12:00 in the ET timezone have final "Close" prices that are exactly equal.

The resolution source for this market is https://www.binance.com, specifically the ARB/USDT and SUI/USDT “Close” prices, currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ARB_USDT and  https://www.binance.com/en/trade/SUI_USDT respectively. The Binance API url for ARB/USDT and SUI/USDT may be used in the event that the chart is unavailable.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ARB/USDT and SUI/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will $BEN or $JEFF have a higher market cap on May 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "BEN" if $BEN has a higher Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV) than $JEFF on May 31, 2023, 12 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "JEFF" if $JEFF has a higher FDV than $BEN on May 31, 2023, 12 PM ET. 

If Ben and Jeff have equal FDVs on May 31, 2023, 12 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be CoinGecko, specifically the "Fully Diluted Valuation" figure located on each asset's page (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ben and https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/jeff). If CoinGecko is unavailable at the check time, a consensus of credible sources of both coins' FDVs will be used.

The FDV for each asset at 12:00 PM ET will be memorialized on the Polymarket market description after the resolution time passes: https://polymarket.com/event/will-ben-or-jeff-have-a-higher-market-cap-on-may-31

If Ben and Jeff have equal FDVs on May 31, 2023, 12 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Trump mention DeSantis more than Biden during his CNN town hall?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump mentions DeSantis more times than he mentions Biden during his CNN town hall scheduled for 9 PM ET on May 10, 2023. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No." If they have an equal amount of mentions the market resolves to "No."

Only the following phrasings will count as mentions of DeSantis:
"Ron"
"DeSantis"
"Ron DeSantis"
"Ron DeSanctimonious"
"Ron DeSanctus"

Note that if e.g. he says "Ron DeSantis", it only counts as one mention. 

Only the following phrasing will count as mentions of Biden:
"Joe"
"Joseph"
"Biden"
“Joe Biden"
"Joseph Biden"

Note that if e.g. he says "Joe Biden's", it only counts as one mention. 

Pluralization/possessive of the above names will count toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source is live video of the CNN town hall. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

If this event is cancelled or delayed beyond May 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No"."

events.title: Trump CNN Town Hall: Will he mention...?
events.description: This is a market group over which specific terms Donald J. Trump will mention in his CNN town hall scheduled for 9 PM ET, May 10.

question: Will George Santos remain in Congress through June 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if George Santos is the Member of the U.S. House of Representatives from New York's 3rd district without interruption from May 9 through June 30, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If George Santos ceases to be a member of Congress before this market's end date, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Government of the United States of America or official statements by George Santos or his representative, however a consensus of credible reporting will suffice.
